item.title: Groovy Govee Account Takeover
item.description: Recently, I got my hands on the Govee DreamView P1 Light Bars (model H6054). According to Govee, their product uses the smart camera to intelligently recognize and capture the colors on your TV screen and automatically applies them to your backlights. This device reminds me, in terms of functionality, of the Philips Ambilight, only that the product comes in different variations and can be installed on TVs and monitors. Before telling you more about this easy-peasy yet impactful account takeover of all Govee Home connected devices, let me introduce you to Govee first.
